{{ddcl|since=c++20|
bool stop_possible() const noexcept;
}}

Checks if the {{tt|stop_source}} object has a stop-state.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if the {{tt|stop_source}} object has a stop-state, otherwise {{c|false}}.

===Notes===
If the {{tt|stop_source}} object has a stop-state and a stop request has already been made, this function still returns {{c|true}}.
